comments:
Use the create wizard to create "Other" Style and default for the rest, and a
Shell is automatically generated.

Other may not necesarily be a SWT class.

Also, the Create Wizard should use the Palettes icons (for the style
selections), and let Other be a folder with "Object" as the only (currrent)
Other style.
